snippet.title: EFFIGY Reveal Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
From the developer of the critically-acclaimed narrative adventure game Sagebrush, EFFIGY is a retro first-person shooter set in a huge, mysterious interconnected world. Blending the fast-paced action of classic shooters of the 90s with the exploration and nonlinear progression of the Metroidvania and Souls genres.

Episode I: The Black Moon coming in 2021.

Wishlist now at effigy-game.com!
Follow development on twitter at https://twitter.com/ludodrome
